# List of changes in D-Mason's releases

= 2.1 (03 May 2013) =
  * Automatic update of workers _(Mario)_
  * Automatic deploy of simulations _(Mario)_
  * Batch execution _(Mario)_
  * Parameters space exploration tool _(Mario)_
  * Automatically assign regions to workers when number of regions is not multiple of number of workers _(Mario)_
  * Fields initialization refactoring
    * Remove the Object[] param from the constructors _(Mario)_
    * Allow passing arbitrary simulation parameter for initialization  _(Mario)_
  * Manage ActiveMQ using D-MASON's master through ActiveMQWrapper _(Mario)_
  * Automatically select linear or grid partitioning depending on the selected number of rows and columns _(Fabio, Mario)_
  * Support for arbitrary field size (not only multiple of partitioning rows/columns) _(Fabio)_
  * Support for non-square fields using grid partitioning _(Fabio)_
  * Include license _(Fabio, Luca, Mario)_
  * Simulation-global properties _(Luca)_
